titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Jo Ann Davis, a Representative of the Commonwealth of Virginia.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 717.
DEBATE - The House proceeded further with debate on H. Res. 717.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/9/2007--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Jo Ann Davis, a former Representative from the Commonwealth of Virginia. Declares that when the House adjourns on October 9, 2007, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Representative Davis.
